website_summaries.verdict: An affordable way for children to experience Hatchimals that offers the fun of discovering the cute, collectible characters inside.
pros: Color-changing hearts on the eggshells add excitement as kids rub them to make them hatch
Adorable small characters glow in the dark
Affordable price for a pack of 12 minis
cons: Some kids were disappointed to find several duplicate figures after they were all hatched
"Hatching" for these small toys is a manual process

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: Seems there are only 12 of these available. The outside of the package tells you exactly what is in the eggs. My 5YO loves them and sleeps with one every night as her "night light". BUT, only order 1....you will get them all.
customer_reviews.author: PCL

customer_reviews.title: Do not order more than 1!
customer_reviews.text: We had the same problem as others did. Ordered 2 cartons and they were exactly the same. All 10 were identical. I get you may get a few duplicates but the entire thing? $20 stolen is now I feel😡
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: You get all 12 automatically, you can make them glow before hatching them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these for her collection. NOTE THERE ARE EXACTLY 12 AT THIS TIME, so you don't need more than one set unless you specifically want doubles. Great for gifts or just whatever. I like to hide several eggs a week in random places for her to find. Right now I use a LED flashlight to shine through the egg holes and get the hatchimal glowing before setting this down in her nest at night. When she comes in to go to bed she sees the egg glowing. (of course you have to time it quickly before it fades).
customer_reviews.author: R&M Ho

customer_reviews.title: The product was very nice and a buy again
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves hatchimals. These were delivered quickly and packaged just as expected. I am very pleased with the product. Other reviews mentioned there are only 12 of the glowing ones. So I haven’t dared order another set. The hatchimals didn’t glow until I put them under light. Which was expected really.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.text: i only bought 2 of the 12 packs of these two because I was afraid they’d be doubled. I was wrong! I didn’t get any doubles besides the two fish included. They are so cute& pretty neat. If you dip them in hot water they change colors, cold they go back to the way they was when they was hatched! I recommend these! I wish I ordered more! And I haven’t seen any one get the same ones either! My son messed with the packs so I’m not sure which ones came in the packs so some might be mixed up but there are no doubles! My son loved them. He wants more lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They glow like torches and make my kids happy
customer_reviews.text: Coolest hatchimals yet. They are super cute, as normal. Hatching is lots of fun, as normal. What's not normal is that when you shine a flashlight at them for 5 or 6 seconds and take them to a dark room they glow like little adorable pieces of kryptonite in a Superman movie. My girls flipped out when they discovered this. Then they asked me to buy more of them because, in an eight year old's world, a dozen just isn't enough. Just imagine how devastated they'd be if I'd only gotten a four pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves these little toys! We use them as rewards for things like potty training and when she is really good at the doctor or long errand days. They are small so they are easy to put away and to take with us places. They are just the best, cute little toys.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Creer

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 - all were exactly the same
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my daughter when they first came out. She loved them so I ordered another one about 3 weeks later to give her a prizes. The second package all were identical to the others - same limited editions, same rares, etc. As much as I would like to get more for her I won't be ordering again for fear of triplets.
customer_reviews.author: H Clark

customer_reviews.title: The cutest ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest series of Hatchimals so far!!! I want more!
customer_reviews.author: Zoran I.

customer_reviews.title: Daughters love them!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a friend’s birthday, and my daughter loved them so much she asked me to get her some. She loves “hatching” them, but she still plays with them long after they’ve hatched. I see them all over her bedroom and even the bathtub. I know if I asked her, she would definitely recommend these to any other eight or nine-year-old girl.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Cartons may contain fewer (if any) duplicates??
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these. And judging by the current reviews, the manufacturer is finally making cartons with DIFFERENT eggs! Ours were totally different than two separate reviews already posted. So, that means there are at least three different cartons without duplicates.
customer_reviews.author: CentIL13

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My goddaughter had more fun with these than the large harchimal! We tried to check the glow in the dark ability but didn’t work first time but didn’t have them under the light for long. Haven’t checked back with her yet but they are so cute and the ‘egg’ container they came with seems solid to store.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old niece LOVED these eggs! And so did all of the adults & older kids at her party. The little collectables inside were adorable, not some cheap looking toy & they do change color in water. I honestly like these one better than a set someone had got her from Walmart. I will be buying more for my daughter :)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy two if you whant diferente hatchimals
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good experience, I order two because I whant to give a surprise to my daughter and the surprise was that they send the exact same hatchimals so my daughter was disappointed because obese she open the first package and everything was happiness when she start the second one and she realized that she is Getting the same she was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Mesias

customer_reviews.title: Our Youngest Granddaughter Asked For These As A Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find something that our Granddaughter likes with her ever changing likes and dislikes can sometimes be difficult but when it comes to Hatchimals there is no doubt, she loves them! When asked for some ideas for her upcoming birthday, the Mermel Magic Hatchimals were first on her list. The 12 pack carton is very colorful and great for storing the Hatchimal creatures once they have hatched and it is great to see her actually spend time playing with these creatures and being away from her electronics.
customer_reviews.author: PawPawRon

customer_reviews.title: Season 5 !!!
customer_reviews.text: Included pics of my dozen to help people decide if they want to try ordering a second dozen. It doesn't look identical to the other 2 pics posted, but I haven't decided whether to risk it yet.
customer_reviews.author: imdebra

customer_reviews.title: Cute as a bug's ear
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has yet to rub the eggs until the winged glow-in-the-dark critters emerge -- that will take place on Christmas Day -- but from what I can see so far, this is a winner. Exactly as pictured: a dozen eggs in an egg carton. Of course, it helps that the child (a four-year-old) is already obsessed with Hatchimals. I bought the tree house holder (suggested by Amazon) for them too. She's going to flip. Can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimals forever!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is crazy about hatchimals. I am convinced if she had to choose between me or hatchimals I would likely have no chance. Very cute and these glow in the dark which Is fun. Sparkly wings and heart shaped holes in their chests. By far our favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Briggs

customer_reviews.title: They definitely glow
customer_reviews.text: My daughter heard about these glow in the dark hatchimals and she just had to have them to add to her collection. She loves them. You do have to expose them to light for a little while, but they definitely glow. There were no duplicates in this set which is always good, and there were some fun new creatures we hadn't seen before. If you know someone who loves hatchimals, these are a great addition to have in your collection.
customer_reviews.author: kkchat

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Full set of 12 hatchimals. We have not hatched them yet as they’re Christmas gifts for the kids. They love these little guys and are always so excited to hatch them.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: Wow, exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome solar lights. Very bright! Highly recommend these. Keep in mind they are solar powered so they need ample exposure to the sun to charge properly. Will update with photos asap.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brooks

customer_reviews.title: No golden egg :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. My kids were excited to get a golden egg. Unfortunately one of the packs did not come with a golden egg as pictured. One child got a golden egg and the other did not and was very disappointed. Any parent knows this is not an ideal situation to have to deal with. Luckily I’m a pro and could help smooth over the situation. However, I would like others to be warned this could happen. Otherwise it’s a great toy that can provide hours of fun. Just wish it came with the golden egg as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Characters aren’t a surprise
customer_reviews.text: I thought what was inside the eggs were supposed to be a surprise and you could collect different ones. This one has a picture of the 12 characters that will be in the eggs on the outside of the package. So no surprises. The characters are incredibly cute and we like them, but the main reason we ordered them was for the surprise of what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Squishy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on sale. If your kids like these don't buy them at the store, I paid $15.99 at Walmart for three eggs. I bought this 12 pack carton for $12.99 at Christmas time. We got a lot of diversity in our crate so I was happy. These are awesome, if your kid likes them, I don't know, I saw her open a dragon and definitely stole that. I named him squish
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: what is a hatchimal??
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe the craze for little kids is unwrapping a toy twice!! Maybe im just to old for this noise, but seriously, these are quarter machine toys wrapped in an egg wrapped in a toy box, .. what is happening?? They did glow in the dark/black light though so that was neat
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jurado

customer_reviews.title: THEY GLOW!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these little eggs so much. We’ve been using them as potty training prizes & it’s working brilliantly! All the eggs showed up in pristine condition with no damage to the packaging. Also, this edition is exciting because they glow in the dark & toddlers love anything that glows lol. So overall great purchase! Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephi Does NailsTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Kids love, and they don't take up much space!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! I was pleased that after ordering 3 sets, we ended up with only a couple duplicates. The mermaid theme was a perfect gift for our mermaid bday party! The sets also had plenty of the "extra special" eggs. These are the latest child obsession, and I'm so happy they can just be put away in one bin!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael G.

customer_reviews.title: Great toys
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter for her birthday. She loves them. I love that you get so many and there is a nice case to keep them in so they don't get lost. The hatchimals are cute and brightly colored. All of my kids love playing with them
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: X-mas gift
customer_reviews.text: Grammy was a hit! Last years X-mas gift for my six-year old grand daughter and she loved it. Pretty much all I can say, she loves these critters and wanted to play with them immediately instead of continuing opening gifts. That's like a huge "wow-factor" in gift giving, in my opinion. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shari Lyne DuShane

customer_reviews.title: Best Hatchimals Gift Available! Kudos to Creators!!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for 5 yr old, LOVES IT! The carton is my favorite because it offers a place to keep them organized. Wasn’t aware of neon night...?? Will put them under lights tonight and if glows she will be even more excited! Excellent idea & construction.
customer_reviews.author: GEM1

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: We really loce hatchimals. My daughter has over 700 and still collecting. Like this seaosn alot. I wish they had more twins though.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Best Season so far
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. This is the best season so far. The eggs themselves are the prettiest in this season - so much that she is reluctant to open them.
customer_reviews.author: theuniverseguru

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we had in mind, the Easter Bunny his these, along with Easter eggs on Easter morning. It was a huge hit with both girls & boys.
customer_reviews.author: Nasel_7

customer_reviews.title: Great for small rewards for kids who don’t like stickers. Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t love hatchimals. I bought this set to give to my girls as a reward for something each day. They looked forward to earning one. I found the set to have great variety of animals. All around great!
customer_reviews.author: Marina G

customer_reviews.title: Changes color in warm water
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter loves these collections. I had read that they change color when wet and that didn’t work ..... at first. One day while in her bath she asked for them and then they changed color immediately. It takes warm not cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Resident

customer_reviews.title: So fun to crack!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loved these for Xmas & I got them when they were on sale for $13 so that was a huge bonus from the normal $20. These Aden so fun to crack open and always a surprise which hatchimal you’ll get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really glows!
customer_reviews.text: We placed the Hatchimal under a light (very close to the bulb) for only a few minutes and the glow lasted all night! When we woke up in the morning it was still glowing, awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Fun But A But Pricy
customer_reviews.text: Great fun product for kids. They change color under warm water, so not only is it fun to find out what you get but to also find out what color it changes to. Good set. Price could be cheaper, toys like these are always overpriced because of the hype
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lee

customer_reviews.title: Same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The Hatchimals you receive are the same as pictured, so don't order two! They all glow in the dark as stated. As with most glow-in-the-dark items, they glow much brighter if you leave them in natural sunlight vs artificial light.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of repeats
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be fun for kids and not the same figure over and over
customer_reviews.author: Diana WC

customer_reviews.title: Please read all the info before complaining.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the other reviewers that are complaining I read all the info and knew that these are a special on Amazon so it is one set of 12. That's it. Do not buy more thinking you will get different. It clearly says 12 neon. They are super cute and works well with the lighted playsets.
customer_reviews.author: Lanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as described. My daughter got them for her birthday and it was her first set of mermals so no worries over repeats. Even if she got repeats she would have been happy with them. She loves playing with them at bath time which is great as the don't mold like a lot of bath toys.
customer_reviews.author: BDB FAN

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter loves these things! She has a little difficulty opening the egg but I just push a hole in it and let her finish the job. They are even cooler because they glow in the dark. These are her favorite ones yet!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great time-consuming activity/gift
customer_reviews.text: My neice LOVED this! She's 4 and requires time-consuming activities. But beware, it gets messy with all the eggshell and the little guys fit just enough to make it halfway down the sink pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter. But the toy didn’t came out great. To open the eggs was fun but the pets inside the egg was small. Is very easy to lose the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Ben11355

customer_reviews.title: Excitement
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? My 6 and 4 year old grand-daughters have so much fun opening these hatchimals just to discover what is inside. They love playing with the little animals when finished and collecting them. They also like to take them in the bathtub and play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these twice my grand daughter absolutely loves opening these aside from playing with them for hours. Great price for the product!
customer_reviews.author: marian romain

customer_reviews.title: Cute as heck!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be like the others...keep rubbing and rubbing but no these eggs where very easy to hatch and the little animals inside were cute as heck besides them being glow in the dark. Great buy, I scored a few points there with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Islam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift but it seems to have the plastic burned onto the pink carton and a crack in that egg. Not sure if this is new or not??? Very disappointing. I’m not sure if o can give this as a gift because now I’m nervous it is not a new set and it’s too late to order a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loves the glowing feature
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters birthday. She squealed when she opened it. She opened up every egg in less than 30 minutes. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these
customer_reviews.text: It's one of those things that has me as an adult scratching my head, but kids really do love these. And this fun little egg carton set is a nice way to arrange these little plastic winged creatures. Makes a great gift to be doled out one little egg at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Cute Glow in the Dark Hatchimals
customer_reviews.text: My daughters have enjoyed opening these hatchimals. We have let them open one a day to count down to Christmas. They are cute and my girls like that these hatchimals glow in the dark. They look forward to finding out which one they will get each day.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hatchimals Lovers
customer_reviews.text: Kids love opening these eggs to find out which Hatchimals are inside. The dropped star is not for quality, but because I find all small toys like these and Shopkins way overpriced. But the joy our kids got from these is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Hit with the Kids
customer_reviews.text: We actually used these for our Easter Egg hunt. It was a great success and they were highly sought after by the kids. Would purchase again. One of the mom’s texted me afterwards that this was her daughter’s best egg hunt.
customer_reviews.author: Rabidus Matris

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a blast opening these adorable little mermaid animals and plays with them all the time! The color change is such a fun aspect too! I’ll admit, I even got excited watching her open them to see which ones she would get!
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We thought it was the color change one. Overall my child liked hatching the eggs and it kept her busy since there where 12. Good value for cost.
customer_reviews.author: Megheartsamazon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set
customer_reviews.text: Overall my girls love this. They have several hatchimal sets. I’m not a huge fan of how small hatchimals are. This was a nice set for Christmas time since they seemed to have a winter theme.
customer_reviews.author: PapaSmurf

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest. My 13 year old son loves them. He has autism and likes to collect things like this. I like how they pack neatly away.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynnIrene

customer_reviews.title: Parent yuck, kids love
customer_reviews.text: I hate that they aren't recyclable, that once you hatch them they're pretty much useless, and that they then often get left on the floor. But there's no denying that kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: No issues, got what I expected- great!
customer_reviews.text: I happened to get these on a flash deal so very happy with the price I paid, and they came as expected with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: iamshopping

customer_reviews.title: 😫
customer_reviews.text: So I guess they are cool from a child's stand point. Horrible from a parents point of view for the mer fact is they hurt super bad when you step on them. They are easy to see at night due to the glow in the dark part.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany lopez

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Hard to rate the value since I feel these toys are silly and over priced, regardless of the toy. But my little niece loved them. So the price I paid vs her smile I would say it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Darkskittlez23

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves these
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit this Christmas. Our almost 3 year old loved hatching all of the eggs, and loved how pretty all of the creatures are.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney  Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Clever new eggs.
customer_reviews.text: The glowing hatch animals are a great idea as it keeps kids collecting them. I thought we were done buying these but then these glowing toys were made available. These are a Christmas present but I know they will be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie H

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter looooves these lol. These are great for stocking stuffers and we even buy a carton for Easter lol.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my son
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yo loves Hatchimals. He absolutely loved this set. I havent seen them glow in the dark yet but they are super cute either way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun and cute, we loved how they change color in the cold/hot water. My toddler plays with them all of the time. they are fun in the bath too!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie smith

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with these. Carries them with him everywhere. Great gift for any child who loves the smaller toys.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Holub

customer_reviews.title: Best hatchanimals  set we've purchased
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love. Super cute, durable, and it's nice to get more than two at a time for a change. May order my daughter more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bosphoto

customer_reviews.title: 4yr old loves these
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old loves these, I got them on a flash deal so the price was a little closer to reasonable than usual. Animals are cute, eggs were easy enough to break open.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: They are cute and adorable and glow in the dark very well.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. And really holds the light for a while after turning out the lights. They are super cute. But they only have the 12 that come in this set. So if you were to get two of these you’d have duplicates of everything. Just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: Callisto Designs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going to absolutely love these it’s definitely a steal for your money comes with 12 different eggs
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved these!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved these, not only hatching the animals but the animals as well. She is very into tiny things, and this suited that. I found the eggs a little hard to break into, but she didn't seem to mind. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amlit

customer_reviews.title: Cute little animals
customer_reviews.text: My nephew enjoyed opening the eggs to find the little creatures inside. He hasn't played with the creatures much but at least they are contained in the case!
customer_reviews.author: Cjean

customer_reviews.title: Good for the collectors
customer_reviews.text: For a kid that likes hatchimals this is great. They come in colourful eggs and the "egg carton" is perfect for storing. They color change very easily and they're just cute.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimal Mermaid magic
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just opened her dozen eggs and was quite surprised at the different Hatchimals inside. It is fabulous that they change color with water! These would have to be the best set if Hatchimals release so far!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie P

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe hatchibles are so expensive, but my granddaughter loves them, so they are worth the price to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why but kids love these
customer_reviews.text: I guess you just have to be young to enjoy these. I don't see the fascination, but they were incredibly popular for 7-9 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Kids are crazy for these!
customer_reviews.text: KEY: Keep a decent sized bowl of the warm water going! We used the microwave. Adult supervision totally. Warm water changes the accent shape color on eggs & softens the shell.
customer_reviews.author: mamaw

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimal set that pleases
customer_reviews.text: My only dislike is the amount of trash created from a toy...packaging, plastic eggs pieces, everything plastic-pollution...that is what Hatchimals are though. My child got this and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: We used these for Easter egg hunt...we put one egg in a plastic egg and hide them outside!!! The kids loved them and had fun trading with each other!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Franke

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: I use these in a toy vending machine and the kids go crazy whenever they get an egg
customer_reviews.author: SLG

customer_reviews.title: Fun hatchimals
customer_reviews.text: Great hatchimals. My kids were very pleased. They look cool with a flashlight under them.
customer_reviews.author: REH

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Glows In The Dark
customer_reviews.text: Good verity and definitely glows in the dark! I like that I can see them in the dark and not kill my foot accidentally stepping on them haha
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie chism

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5yr. Old daughter. She absolutely love them! She loves all the little critters that come out of the eggs and the fact that these ones glow was a bonus!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last year (season 1 ) these are adorable little surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Marzo_Vente

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these and we use each egg as a prize to earn. She gets so excited about cleaning or studying because she knows she will get to pick out a surprise toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tran

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters love love love hatchimals!!!!!! Enjoy hatching and playing with them!!!
customer_reviews.author: cathi carthel

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these things, so these were a big hit at Easter time. The only have one downside- they hurt like hell when you step on one in the middle of the night lol
customer_reviews.author: Nurseblanche

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Hatchimals yet!
customer_reviews.text: How can you go wrong with these especially ones that glow in the dark! My kids loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Agoody

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these. I put them in her Christmas stocking every year.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: This product made my 4 year old very happy.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a serious collector of Hatchimals and enjoyed having so many to open in one sitting. Kept her busy for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hano

customer_reviews.title: We love hatchimals
customer_reviews.text: These ones are so fun when you put them on a light. The little heart on the chest lights up and the whole body kind of glows. I my kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.text: This was a great birthday gift for my 3 year old. The eggs broke open very easily. The toys weren't too small for her to play with.

product_meta.title: Hatchimals CollEGGtibles, Neon Nightglow 12 Pack Egg Carton with Season 4 Hatchimals CollEGGtibles, Amazon Exclusive, for Ages 5 and Up
product_meta.description: Style:Amazon Exclusive - Neon NightglowGlow on the go with the Hatchimals CollEGGtibles Neon Nightglow 12-Pack Egg Carton, available exclusively on Amazon! Filled with all-new Season 4 characters, these little cuties are neon-colored and glow in the dark! To light up your world, lift the star-covered lid and you’ll find twelve orange and pink ombre eggs! Using your love and care, hatch these new characters! Put one egg in the palm of your hand and rub the purple heart until it turns pink! Gently press down to crack the shell and meet your Hatchimals! Place them on a light to see them shine bright! These colorful Hatchimals look even more adorable as they glow! Once you’ve hatched all your new friends, keep them snuggly inside the egg carton. While the lid has pretty stars, the bottom of your egg carton has cozy molded nests – a perfect home for all your Hatchimals! Glow on the go with the Neon Nightglow 12-Pack Egg Carton, available only on Amazon!
feature_bullets: COLLECT GLOW-IN-THE-DARK CHARACTERS: Add Neon Nightglow characters to your collEGGtion! This 12-Pack Egg Carton has adorable Season 4 cuties with vibrant neon colors! Place them on a light to see them shine bright!

GLOW ON THE GO: This Amazon exclusive egg carton has a starry lid and a base filled with 12-molded nests. Keep your in-egg and out-of-egg Hatchimals cozy inside and take them with you, wherever you glow!

HOW TO HATCH: Who will you hatch? Use your love and care to rub your egg’s purple heart until it turns pink! Once the color magically changes, press down to gently crack the shell and meet your new friend!
Hatchimals CollEGGtibles 12-Pack Neon Nightglow Egg Carton is a great gift for kids aged 5+. Combine with the Hatchy Home Light-up Nest playset (not included) to show how your Hatchimals shine!
